00010 VoIPModule::VoIPModule(Config* _config) :
00011         config(*_config) {
00012         sipAgent = new SIP_Agent(config.localIP);
00013         if (config.doSteg) {
00014                 packetsManager = new StegLACK(_config);
00015         } else {
00016                 packetsManager = new NoSteg(_config);
00017         }
00018 }
00019 
00020 VoIPModule::~VoIPModule() {
00021         delete &sipAgent;
00022         delete &packetsManager;
00023 }
00024 
00028 void VoIPModule::doSending() {
00029         // tutaj odbieramy od sipAgent dane potrzebne dla RTPAgent (ewentualnie też RTCPAgent)
00030         callInfo = sipAgent->Call(config.calleeID, rtpAgent->localPortRTP);
00031         if (callInfo.remotePort == 0) {
00032                 throw runtime_error("Call failed");
00033         }
00034         rtpAgent->setRemoteIP(callInfo.remoteIP);
00035         rtpAgent->setRemotePort(callInfo.remotePort);
00036 
00037         doTransport();
00038 }
00039 
00043 void VoIPModule::doReceiving() {
00044         // tutaj odbieramy od sipAgent dane potrzebne dla RTPAgent (ewentualnie też RTCPAgent)
00045         callInfo = sipAgent->Answer(rtpAgent->localPortRTP);
00046         if (callInfo.remotePort == 0) {
00047                 throw runtime_error("Call failed");
00048         }
00049         rtpAgent->setRemoteIP(callInfo.remoteIP);
00050         rtpAgent->setRemotePort(callInfo.remotePort);
00051 
00052         doTransport();
00053 }
00054 
00055 void VoIPModule::doTransport() {
00056         RTPPacket rtpPacket;
00057         Timer timer;
00058         timer.start();
00059         int delay_us;
00060 
00061         while (sipAgent->connected() && !Main::getInstance()->isHangUp()) {
00062                 PRN_(3, "VoIP: getNextPacket...");
00063                 rtpPacket = packetsManager->getNextPacket();
00064                 PRN_(3, "VoIP: OK have packet");
00065                 PRNBITS_(4, rtpPacket.header->toString());
00066 
00067                 VAR_(4, (int) rtpPacket.delay);
00068 
00069                 delay_us = min(rtpPacket.delay - (int)timer.seeTime(), rtpPacket.delay);
00070                 VAR_(4, delay_us);
00071                 usleep(Timer::USECONDS_IN_A_MILISECOND * delay_us);
00072                 timer.start();
00073                 PRN_(3, "VoIP: sendPacket");
00074                 rtpAgent->sendPacket(rtpPacket);
00075         }
00076         sipAgent->Disconnect();
00077 }
00078 
00079 //@Override
00080 void VoIPModule::update() {
00081         processIncomingPackets();
00082 }
00083 
00089 void VoIPModule::processIncomingPackets() {
00090         PRN_(4, "VoIP: processIncomingPackets...");
00091         while (rtpAgent->hasReceivedPacket()) {
00092                 RTPPacket& packet = rtpAgent->getReceivedPacket();
00093                 packetsManager->putReceivedPacketData(packet);
00094         }
00095 }
00096 
00100 void VoIPModule::connect() {
00101         if (sipAgent->Register(config.myUser, config.myPass, config.SIPProxyIP,
00102                         config.SIPProxyPort)) {
00103                 PRN("SIP Register successfully done")
00104         } else {
00105                 PRN("SIP Register failed")
00106                 return; // TODO throw exception
00107         }
00108 
00109         rtpAgent = new RTPAgent();
00110         rtpAgent->addObserver(*this);
00111 
00112         if (config.weAreCalling) {
00113                 doSending();
00114         } else {
00115                 doReceiving();
00116         }
00117         sipAgent->Unregister();
00118 }
